Name: Pengu Never Left
About the game: Fish, listen to music and relax as the days pass by in this relaxing minimalistic game. Maybe you'll fish up something interesting? There's plenty to unlock and discover from an old cassette player to old letters from friends! The island changes over time, not just with your progression but with the seasons too! expect slight changes in weather, and the island as the seasons come and go! What to expect in terms of 'content': 9 collectable items 2 unlockable rooms to the house 9 types of fish (which can all be viewed in the fish log) 7 collectable cassettes 9 collectable letters
